availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pulaski County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Martha J. York Pierce in Jefferson County, Tennessee, on January 24, 1858. Father of Mary A. Pierce, Martha M. Pierce, and Daniel B. Pierce. Farmer in Pulaski County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pulaski County, District 1, p. 313.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Bradley County, District 6, p. 322B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994053, Pulaski County Births.
Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, Jefferson County, Marriages: June 1840 - April 1870, p. 161.
KYR-0001-020-0463.
